Link inline this way

Task lists are fantastic usage of the GitHub-specific implementation: Task List

  • [x] Step one is complete
  • [ ] Step two in this unordered list is
  • [x] Step three is done as well

Renders as: Task List

 Step one is complete  Step two in this unordered list is   Step three is done as well

Q1: What is the best website in the world? A1: Opensource.com

mermaid graph TD;

A-->B; A-->C; B-->D; C-->D;
